pageContext.claim: “So...by the FBI's post-Trump standards for C.I. investigations, would this off-mike exchange between Obama & Putin's deputy (where Obama offers Putin "more flexibility" on NATO missile defense in Europe) be grounds for opening an espionage probe of Obama?”
pageContext.analysis: According to the New York Times, the FBI opened a counterintelligence investigation into whether Trump was knowingly or unknowingly working on behalf of Russia after a slew of incidents raised suspicions before and after FBI Director James B. Comey was fired.
